questions.question: What was the main aim of the Indian National Congress when it was formed?
options: To gain independence from British rule
questions.answer: To gain independence from British rule

questions.question: Who was the leader of the Non-Cooperation Movement?
What was the significance of the Dandi March?
options: It marked the beginning of the Quit India Movement
It was a protest against the salt tax
It was a call for complete independence
It was a campaign for social equality
questions.answer: It was a protest against the salt tax
